pages.text: The $(d)Redstone Remote$() acts like the $(l:items/redstone_activator)Redstone Activator$(/l), but instead powers up to 9 selectable locations.$(br2)Sneak right-click to open its GUI. Place a filled $(l:items/location_filter)Location Filter$(/l) in one of the top slots to add it. You can optionally place any item in the slot below it to add an icon to the location button.
pages.title: Redstone Remote

pages.text: Use while not sneaking to access the location buttons. Clicking one will power that location for a short duration.
